nodes.text: MGK-300 was a droid intelligence installed aboard Imperial TIE/rb starfighters for pilot support. One was on Han Solo's TIE/rb heavy starfighter while serving the Empire in Onyx Squadron under the callsign Onyx Nine. The droid was upset when Solo disobeyed command and flew alone to save his friend from pirates and almost destroyed their fighters too.
The MGK-300 was developed for Solo: A Star Wars Story.
